vote.text: Amendment SA 5262 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 5262 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Hutchison. (consideration: CR S8005; text: CR S8005) To improve the bill.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 5262 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Hutchison.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 5262 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
